title: The circus continues
author: VD
content_html:
Setting aside the hidden birth certificate, how old is Obama anyhow?

A new wrinkle in the dispute over his birth – and whether he is eligible to be president under the U.S. Constitution’s requirement that the president be a “natural born” citizen – appeared today when Obama’s official MySpace page declared his age is 52, thus placing his birth year at 1957 instead of 1961 as has been claimed…. a check of the Internet archive “Wayback Machine” finds that on April 10, 2007, Obama had his age listed as 45 on MySpace, which would be correct if, in fact, he had been born in August 1961 as has been trumpeted.

I would normally assume that this is just simple incompetence on the part of an Obama staffer, which would appear to be a safe and logical assumption in light of the administration’s performance thus far. But, considering the increasingly bizarre aspects of his parental history in the timeline that WND has constructed based on the available documentation, it’s probably not safe to assume anything at this point.
content_text:
Setting aside the hidden birth certificate,
how old is Obama anyhow
?
A new wrinkle in the dispute over his birth – and whether he is eligible to be president under the U.S. Constitution’s requirement that the president be a “natural born” citizen – appeared today when Obama’s official MySpace page declared his age is 52, thus placing his birth year at 1957 instead of 1961 as has been claimed…. a check of the Internet archive “Wayback Machine” finds that on April 10, 2007, Obama had his age listed as 45 on MySpace, which would be correct if, in fact, he had been born in August 1961 as has been trumpeted.
I would normally assume that this is just simple incompetence on the part of an Obama staffer, which would appear to be a safe and logical assumption in light of the administration’s performance thus far.  But, considering the increasingly bizarre aspects of his parental history in the timeline that WND has constructed based on the available documentation, it’s probably not safe to assume anything at this point.
